Module eu.steffo.cleaver
Package eu.steffo.cleaver.gui.panels.rows.option

Class SplitRow

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
eu.steffo.cleaver.gui.panels.rows.Row
eu.steffo.cleaver.gui.panels.rows.option.OptionRow
eu.steffo.cleaver.gui.panels.rows.option.SplitRow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class SplitRow
extends OptionRow
A OptionRow allowing the configuration of the split step of the file chop process.
See Also:
ChopPanel, Serialized Form

  • Field Details

    • splitCheckBox

      protected final javax.swing.JCheckBox splitCheckBox
      The checkbox enabling or disabling the split step. If unticked, getSplitConfig() will return null.

    • firstSeparator

      protected final javax.swing.JSeparator firstSeparator
      A separator between the checkbox and the part size selector.

    • sizeLabel

      protected final javax.swing.JLabel sizeLabel
      A label with "Part size" written on it.

    • sizeTextField

      protected final javax.swing.JTextField sizeTextField
      The text field where the user can select the size of the parts to split the file in. If something is written on it, it disables the partsTextField. It is disabled if something is written on the partsTextField.

    • sizeUnitLabel

      protected final javax.swing.JLabel sizeUnitLabel
      A label with "B" (bytes) written on it.

    • secondSeparator

      protected final javax.swing.JSeparator secondSeparator
      A separator between the file part size selector and the parts number selector.

    • partsLabel

      protected final javax.swing.JLabel partsLabel
      A label with "Parts" written on it.

    • partsTextField

      protected final javax.swing.JTextField partsTextField
      The text field where the user can select the number of parts to split the file in. If something is written on it, it disables the sizeTextField. It is disabled if something is written on the sizeTextField.

    • SplitRow

      public SplitRow()
      Construct a SplitRow.

  • Method Details

    • getSplitConfig

      public SplitConfig getSplitConfig()
      Create a SplitConfig from the settings in this OptionRow.
      Returns:
      The resulting SplitConfig, or null if the splitCheckBox is unticked.

    • setEditable

      public void setEditable​(boolean value)
      Description copied from class: OptionRow
      Allow edits in the fields of the OptionRow.
      Specified by:
      setEditable in class OptionRow
      Parameters:
      value - true if the OptionRow should be editable, false otherwise.

    • update

      protected void update()
      Refresh the enabled/disabled and editable/non-editable status of all components in the SplitRow.
